kpi.name: sgsn_372a
kpi.formula: (overload.rejected_attach_attempts + overload.rej_pdp_cont_act_attempts + overload.rejected_ra_updates + overload.failed_detach_attempts + overload.rej_mo_sms_attempts + overload.rej_attach_in_ear_phase + overload.rej_ra_upd_in_early_phase + overload.rej_pdp_cont_modify_att)

kpi_info.title: Gb overload rejected attempts
kpi_info.use: This KPI shows the total number of rejected attempts from Gb interface due to overload.
kpi_info.formula:
sum(REJECTED_ATTACH_ATTEMPTS + REJ_PDP_CONT_ACT_ATTEMPTS +
REJECTED_RA_UPDATES + FAILED_DETACH_ATTEMPTS +
REJ_MO_SMS_ATTEMPTS + REJ_ATTACH_IN_EAR_PHASE +
REJ_RA_UPD_IN_EARLY_PHASE + REJ_PDP_CONT_MODIFY_ATT)

Counters from table(s): p_sgsn_overload
